summary: Maxi Priest  is a English reggae singer.
full_text: Max Alfred "Maxi" Elliott , known as Maxi Priest, is a British reggae vocalist of Jamaican descent. He is best known for singing reggae music with an R&B influence, otherwise known as reggae fusion, and became one of the first international successes who regularly dabbled in the genre and one of the most successful reggae fusion acts of all-time.
title: Maxi Priest
